This work will be met in that great day when every work shall be brought "into judgment, with every secret thing, whether it be good, or whether it be evil." Jesus says, "Behold, I come quickly; and My reward is with Me, to give every man according as his work shall be." The Lord of heaven is not correctly represented by many of those who claim to be representatives of Him. They are 


                                   -112- 

transgressors of His commandments. But He declares, "Them that honor Me will I honor."
